text:
Question 63) A person opens his refrigerator, checks what is inside and then closes the door of this refrigerator. Then she tries to open the fridge again, but can only do it after exerting a more intense strength than usual.
The extra difficulty to reopen the refrigerator occurs because the
A) Air volume inside the refrigerator decreased.
B) Refrigerator engine is running with maximum power.
C) Force exerted by the magnet fixed on the refrigerator door increases.
D) Pressure inside the refrigerator is below the outer pressure.
E) temperature inside the refrigerator is lower than the existing value before it is opened.
